text.text_translated: At first, Pi is very scared of the animals. He jumps into the sea. Then he remembers something. There are hungry sharks in the water. So, he has only one choice. He must climb back into the lifeboat. The animals in the lifeboat kill and eat each other. Only Pi and the tiger are left. Luckily for Pi, the tiger is sick. Pi names the tiger Richard Parker. The tiger does not want to eat Pi now.
